ingredients: 3 cans of Original Rotel Diced Tomatoes and Green Chilies (30 oz)
steps: Halve the chicken breasts, then combine all the ingredients (undrained) into a crock pot (*makes exactly 3 Qt). Cover and cook on low for 8 hours
Just before serving, slice the chicken breasts into bite size pieces and return to soup
title: Slow Cooker Chicken Tortilla Soup
